cmdList.name: Add All Music
cmdList.description:
Attempts to add all files in ./music folder to the local library under their filenames. Does not overwrite. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Add All Sounds
cmdList.description:
Attempts to add all files in ./sounds folder to the local library under their filenames. Does not overwrite. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Add Song
cmdList.description:
Adds any attached audio files to the local music library. 
Adding '-f' tag will overwrite existing songs with same name. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Add Sound
cmdList.description:
Adds any attached audio files to the local sound library. 
Adding '-f' tag will overwrite existing sounds with same name. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: About
cmdList.description: Displays bot information.

cmdList.name: Flip
cmdList.description: Flips a coin.

cmdList.name: Help
cmdList.description: Displays a list of available commands.

cmdList.name: Play Music
cmdList.description:
Plays specific or random song matching provided search criteria. 
'?' lists songs matching search criteria.

cmdList.name: Play Sound
cmdList.description:
Plays specific or random sound matching provided search criteria. 
'?' lists sounds matching search criteria.

cmdList.name: Play Stream
cmdList.description: Plays audio from the provided YouTube video.

cmdList.name: Purge Music
cmdList.description:
Removes all songs from the local library. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Purge Sounds
cmdList.description:
Removes all sounds from the local library. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: R6 Stats
cmdList.description: Generates a [Rainbow Six Siege](https://rainbow6.ubisoft.com/siege/) Player Action Report.

cmdList.name: Remove Song
cmdList.description:
Deletes a song from the local library structure. Does not delete the file from disk. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Remove Sound
cmdList.description:
Deletes a sound from the local library strcuture. Does not delete the file from disk. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Roll
cmdList.description: Rolls a die.

cmdList.name: Set User Sound
cmdList.description:
Assigns (or removes) a sound to a user. This sound plays when the user joins a populated voice channel. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Song Info
cmdList.description: Displays information about a song.

cmdList.name: Sound Info
cmdList.description: Displays information about a sound

cmdList.name: Stop
cmdList.description: Stops audio playback on voice channel.

aboutBot:
Greetings! I am ALVIS (Asynchronous Learning Virtual Intelligence System). I am currently under development by [PacketCloudâ„¢](https://packetcloud.com). 
My code is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/packetcloud/alvis). 

Please put up with my bugs, as I am still in development.

You can **@mention** or **DM** me for assistance, or type `!help` for a list of commands.
overheardNameResponse:
I heard my name! 
Anything I can do to help? 

*@mention or DM me to get my attention.*
